# Teleprompter Script Tool

A simple **teleprompter bookmarklet for Safari** that overlays your script on any page while you record talking-head videos.

- üßä Minimal overlay (no install, no tracking)
- üéöÔ∏è Controls for speed, font size, opacity, mirroring
- ‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard shortcuts for hands-free use
- ü™û Mirror mode for physical teleprompter glass

---

## ‚ú® Features

- Paste your script directly (inline editor)
- Play / pause with smooth scrolling
- Adjustable **speed**, **font size**, **opacity**
- **Dark/Light** themes and **mirror** mode
- Resizable, draggable overlay
- Works fully offline

> Tested primarily in **Safari**. Also works in modern Chromium browsers.

---

## üöÄ Quick Start (Bookmarklet)

1. Create a new **Bookmark** (Favorites) in Safari.
2. Name: `Teleprompter`
3. URL: paste the one-line bookmarklet below:

```text
javascript:(function(){var d=document;if(d.getElementById('nk-teleprompter')){return;}var s=d.createElement('script');s.src='data:text/javascript;charset=utf-8,'+encodeURIComponent(`(function(){${atob('{YmFja2dyb3VuZDpyZ2JhKDAsMCwwLC45KTpjb2xvcjojRUVEOyBjb2xvcjojRUNFO30=')}\nconst ID='nk-teleprompter';if(document.getElementById(ID)){return;}injectStyle(css);const wrap=document.createElement('div');wrap.id=ID;wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="nk-container"><div class="nk-header"><button class="nk_btn primary" data-act="play">‚ñ∂Ô∏é Play</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="pause">‚è∏Ô∏é Pause</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="rewind">‚Ü∫ Rewind</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="speed-">‚Äì Speed</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="speed+">+ Speed</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="font-">‚Äì Font</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="font+">+ Font</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="opacity-">‚Äì Opacity</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="opacity+">+ Opacity</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="mirror">ü™û Mirror</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="theme">‚òØ Theme</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="edit">‚úé Edit</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="close">‚úï Close</button></div><div class="nk-body"><div class="nk-script" contenteditable="false"></div></div><div class="nk-footer"><span class="info"></span><span class="nk_inforight">Shortcuts: Space=Play/Pause, +/-=Speed, [ ]=Font, O=Opacity, M=Mirror, Esc=Close</span></div></div><div class="nk-editor" style="display:none;"><textarea placeholder="Paste your script here..."></textarea><div><button class="nk_btn primary" data-act="save">Save</button><button class="nk_btn" data-act="cancel">Cancel</button></div></div>`;document.body.appendChild(wrap);const els={wrap,container:wrap.querySelector('.nk-container'),header:wrap.querySelector('.nk-header'),body:wrap.querySelector('.nk-body'),script:wrap.querySelector('.nk-script'),footer:wrap.querySelector('.nk-footer'),info:wrap.querySelector('.info'),editor:wrap.querySelector('.nk-editor'),textarea:wrap.querySelector('textarea')};let st={playing:false,speed:60,font:48,opacity:0.96,mirror:false,theme:'dark',y:0,raf:null};function apply(){els.container.style.opacity=st.opacity;els.script.style.fontSize=st.font+'px';els.container.classList.toggle('dark',st.theme==='dark');els.container.classList.toggle('light',st.theme==='light');els.container.style.transform=st.mirror?'scaleX(-1)':'none';els.info.textContent=`Speed ${st.speed}px/s ¬∑ Font ${st.font}px ¬∑ Opacity ${Math.round(st.opacity*100)}%`;}\nfunction ensureScript(){if(!els.script.textContent.trim()){toggleEditor(true);}}\nfunction tick(ts){if(!st.playing){st.raf=null;return;}els.body.scrollTop=st.y+=st.speed/60;st.raf=requestAnimationFrame(tick);}function play(){ensureScript();if(st.playing)return;st.playing=true;st.raf=requestAnimationFrame(tick);}function pause(){st.playing=false;}\nfunction rewind(){st.y=0;els.body.scrollTop=0;}\nfunction toggleEditor(show){els.editor.style.display=show?'block':'none';if(show){els.textarea.value=els.script.textContent.trim();els.textarea.focus();}}\nfunction saveScript(){els.script.textContent=els.textarea.value||' ';toggleEditor(false);}function onKey(e){const k=e.key.toLowerCase();if(k===' '){e.preventDefault();st.playing?pause():play();}else if(k==='+'){st.speed=Math.min(300,st.speed+10);apply();}else if(k==='-'){st.speed=Math.max(5,st.speed-10);apply();}else if(k==='['){st.font=Math.max(16,st.font-2);apply();}else if(k===']'){st.font=Math.min(120,st.font+2);apply();}else if(k==='o'){st.opacity=Math.min(1,Math.max(0.2,st.opacity-0.05));apply();}else if(k==='p'){st.opacity=Math.min(1,Math.max(0.2,st.opacity+0.05));apply();}else if(k==='m'){st.mirror=!st.mirror;apply();}else if(k==='escape'){cleanup();}}\nfunction onClick(e){const a=e.target.closest('[data-act]');if(!a)return;const act=a.getAttribute('data-act');if(act==='play')play();else if(act==='pause')pause();else if(act==='rewind')rewind();else if(act==='speed-'){st.speed=Math.max(5,st.speed-10);apply();}else if(act==='speed+'){st.speed=Math.min(300,st.speed+10);apply();}else if(act==='font-'){st.font=Math.max(16,st.font-2);apply();}else if(act==='font+'){st.font=Math.min(120,st.font+2);apply();}else if(act==='opacity-'){st.opacity=Math.max(0.2,st.opacity-0.05);apply();}else if(act==='opacity+'){st.opacity=Math.min(1,st.opacity+0.05);apply();}else if(act==='mirror'){st.mirror=!st.mirror;apply();}else if(act==='theme'){st.theme=st.theme==='dark'?'light':'dark';apply();}else if(act==='edit'){toggleEditor(true);}else if(act==='save'){saveScript();}else if(act==='cancel'){toggleEditor(false);}else if(act==='close'){cleanup();}}\nfunction makeDraggable(handle,box){let sx,sy,sl,stp,drag=false;handle.style.cursor='move';handle.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{drag=true;sx=e.clientX;sy=e.clientY;const r=box.getBoundingClientRect();sl=r.left;stp=r.top;e.preventDefault();});document.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{if(!drag)return;const dx=e.clientX-sx,dy=e.clientY-sy;box.style.position='fixed';box.style.left=Math.max(8,sl+dx)+'px';box.style.top=Math.max(8,stp+dy)+'px';});document.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>drag=false);}function cleanup(){pause();wrap.remove();const s=document.getElementById('nk-teleprompter-css');if(s)s.remove();document.removeEventListener('keydown',onKey);}\nwrap.addEventListener('click',onClick);document.addEventListener('keydown',onKey);makeDraggable(els.header,els.container);apply();ensureScript();})();');document.body.appendChild(s);})();``');document.body.appendChild(s);})();
